reviews.review_content:
Professor Bronson may not be the most intellectually stimulating of all CC professors, but he does a fantastic job of making the otherwise dense material understandable.  He lectured very little, instead allowing class discussion to determine almost entirely what got discussed.  He was incredibly generous in allowing us to write rough drafts of all papers; the final also was very fair - he gave us a list of themes and pulled entirely from these in choosing essay questions and passage ids.
If you want a CC class that is fairly relaxed, take Professor Bronson's - enjoyable and hardly painful, though definitely not the hardest of the bunch.
Workload:
Normal CC - 2/3 papers per semester, one final, one midterm.
